name: Summon Cave
desc:
The earth rises around you to form a dome with a radius of 15 feet centered on you. One side of the dome, a 90 degree arc, is left open. You choose which side is open.

The newly formed cave is dark, unless light is inside or can get through the opening. The cave has AC 10 and 50 hit points. If its hit points are reduced to 0, the spell ends immediately as the cave collapses.
empower: The cave has resistance to physical damage.
author: CrusaderDroid
